scripts.deploy: cd .. && rsync -a --omit-dir-times --no-perms --exclude node_modules  --exclude .git --exclude serve/raw-data --exclude serve/raw-days--exclude chart/parsed-data stringline-status/ demo@roadtolarissa.com:stringline-status/
scripts.start: pm2 start -n mta-download server/download.js && pm2 start -n mta-parse server/parse.js
scripts.reload: pm2 reload mta-download && pm2 reload mta-parse
